name: Night Slash
description:
Night Slash

Play as a vampiric samurai and slay the opposition until your last slash! Try not to be overwhelmed by your enemies and parry their attacks to gain the upper hand. Your timing and positioning are key. Too much damage too quickly and your done for!

ControlsMovement:WASD or ⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️AttackSpacebar
Pause:P
Credits

Art, Code and BGM by HaywireJo
SFX from Fire Emblem The Blazing Blade
